titles.title: The Holy Ghost Shall Overshadow Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The Holy Ghost shall overshadow thee.
The Holy Ghost shall overshadow thee.
And that Holy thing, that shall be born of thee,
shall be called the Son of God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be it unto me, according to Thy word.
Be it unto me, according to Thy word.
I shall abide, under the shadow of the Almighty
Be it unto me, according to Thy word

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And my soul, doth magnify the Lord.
And my soul, doth magnify the Lord.
And my spirit doth rejoice in God my Saviour
And my soul, doth magnify the Lord.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: El Santo Espiritu hara sombra sobre ti (2x)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Y eso Santo que nacera de ti,
Sera llamado el Hijo de Dios.
